PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-15982012-11-29,  ,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation ** Purchase and sale of property **
PrecisOrder authorizing the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION (as vendor) to enter into an AGREEMENT of purchase and sale with TELSEC PROPERTY CORPORATION (as purchaser) to dispose of real property located at 12725 - 52nd Street S.E. in Calgary, Alberta.
AttachmentsAttachment
